text: Va agar tarsided, ki adl natavoned kard dar ʙorai jatimduxtarone, ki zeri sarparastii şumo qaror dorand, pas ʙo zanoni digare, ki dūst dored, izdivoç kuned ʙo du jo se jo cor. Pas agar tarsided, ki nametavoned adlro ʙa çoj ovared, pas ʙojad ʙa jak zan kifojat kuned va jo ʙo kanizakonaton izdivoç kuned, in nazdiktarast, ki sitam nakuned
